properties.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Eastern Glacier
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 2 at 8:47AM MST until March 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT
FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON...

* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph, with
gusts near 65 mph occurring. For the High Wind Watch, west winds
35 to 45 mph with gusts near 65 mph possible.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front and Eastern Glacier.

* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 4 PM MST this
afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday evening
through Wednesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow down tree limbs and power
lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile
vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Listen to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for the latest
updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
